title: Still Honor Lvl 2
body: Yet my sons lvl 14 or lvl 15 account just hit honor 3.  He is 7 and sometimes dies a lot. he doesnt play a lot either. Yet im still sitting at honor lvl 2.  like wtf lol

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and I do see that you're accruing honor just not at a rapid level.  You can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), if you'd like our PB team to offer some context on matches that might be a little less than honorable.  Otherwise, just keep at it and you'll get that level up!
